response.original_title: Kool & The Gang:  Live The Best Of Musikladen
response.overview: Their electrifying choreography and true blend of R&B funk with Disco defined the Kool & The Gang look sound and influenced many other groups of the time.  This extraordinary Kool & The Gang concert contains so many of their hits you'll have to get up and boogie.
response.title: Kool & The Gang:  Live The Best Of Musikladen
